an6.69:4.1: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.69:4.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.69:4.6: Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā, saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā—
an6.69:4.7: ime kho, bhante, cha dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
an6.69:4.10: Atha kho sā devatā “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an6.69:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.69:5.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an6.69:5.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, bhikkhave, sā devatā maṃ etadavoca:
an6.69:5.7: Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā, saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā—
an6.69:5.8: ime kho, bhante, cha dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattantī’ti.
an6.69:5.10: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an6.69:6.1: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā etadavoca:
an6.69:6.2: “imassa kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
an6.69:6.3: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu attanā ca satthugāravo hoti satthugāravatāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
an6.69:6.4: Ye caññe bhikkhū na satthugāravā te ca satthugāravatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:6.5: Ye caññe bhikkhū satthugāravā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an6.69:6.11: Ye caññe bhikkhū na kalyāṇamittā te ca kalyāṇamittatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:6.12: Ye caññe bhikkhū kalyāṇamittā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an6.69:6.13: Imassa kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
an6.69:7.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, sāriputta, imassa mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
an6.69:7.3: Idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu attanā ca satthugāravo hoti satthugāravatāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
an6.69:7.4: Ye caññe bhikkhū na satthugāravā te ca satthugāravatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:7.5: Ye caññe bhikkhū satthugāravā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an6.69:7.11: Ye caññe bhikkhū na kalyāṇamittā te ca kalyāṇamittatāya samādapeti.
an6.69:7.12: Ye caññe bhikkhū kalyāṇamittā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an6.69:7.13: Imassa kho, sāriputta, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
